queries.query: CREATE TABLE user ( userId varchar(10) PRIMARY KEY, userName varchar(25), firstName varchar(25), lastName varchar(25), gender varchar(25), address varchar(25), phoneNo varchar(25), email varchar(25), password varchar(25) );
INSERT INTO user(userId, userName, firstName, lastName, gender, address, phoneNo, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

CREATE TABLE booking ( booking_id char(10) PRIMARY KEY, user_id char(10) UNIQUE NOT NULL, event_id char(10) NOT NULL, payment_id varchar(20) NOT NULL, service_id char(10) NOT NULL, event_description varchar(100) );
CREATE TABLE events( eventId varchar(10) NOT NULL, eventName varchar(20), eventDate varchar(10), venue varchar(30), eventDescription varchar(50), budget double, PRIMARY KEY (eventId) );
UPDATE events SET eventName = ?, eventDate = ?, venue = ?, eventDescription = ?, budget = ? WHERE eventId = ?
